alert.note: Alert for Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 7:56PM CDT until November 04 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 756 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Roberson Hollow to 7 miles east of Green Forest to near Capps to near Erbie, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Taneycomo, Bull Shoals Lake, Table Rock Lake, Protem, Rueter and Ridgedale. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
